problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,点C是⊙O上一点,过点C的切线与AB的延长线交于点D,连接AC、CO,若∠A=35°,则∠ADC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, vertex C is a vertex on ⊙O, the tangent line passing vertex C and the extended line of AB intersect at vertex D, connecting AC and CO, if ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠ADC is ()
